entry.title: separate out blockchain db and wallet to two dirs?
entry.summary: The context mentions a sysadmin problem that warrants a feature ticket. The suggestion is to open one on Github. It is important to note that XDGBDS is not canon and it is advised not to hardcode said paths. To avoid this, all paths should be specifiable in the Bitcoin config file. The location of the config file should also be specifiable on the command line.
